name: TravelBucket
0:
”Alexa, open travel bucket”
”tell me about a place”
”Alexa, ask travel bucket, what's in my bucket list”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: travel bucket
des:
You can ask Alexa to tell you about a place. She will then proceed to describe a cool travel destination and ask you if you want to add the place to your travel bucket list. If you respond in the affirmative, she will add the place to your travel bucket list.

You can later retrieve the places in your list by asking travel bucket "what's in my bucket list?". You can later plan a trip to your favorite destinations.

Have fun discovering awesome new places! The list of places is always being updated. So be sure to check back every day! 

For any questions, help or suggestions, please feel free to reach the developer directly at priyankar.kumar98@gmail.com .
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
